uno.cards
Class Face_Card

java.lang.Object
  uno.cards.UNO_Card
      uno.cards.Face_Card
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<UNO_Card>
public class Face_Card
extends UNO_Card

The Face_Card class defines a UNO face card. A face card has a color and a number. Face cards are numbered from 0 to 9.
